mapper.update: update menu set delFlag = 'Y' where menuCode = #{menuCode}
mapper.select: select menuNo from menu where storeNo = #{storeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU (storeNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuPrice, menuNo, menuCode) VALUES (#{storeNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuNo}, #{menuCode})

INSERT INTO MENUATTACHMENT(menuCode, originalFileName, renamedFileName, menuUploadDate, storeNo, status, thumbFlag) VALUES (#{menuCode}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName}, default, #{storeNo}, default, default)
